newsitem.title: MALAYSIA: MALAYSIA STOCKS - factors to watch - April 10.
newsitem.headline: MALAYSIA STOCKS - factors to watch - April 10.

text.p: Following are some of the main factors likely to affect Malaysian stocks on Thursday:
* On Wednesday, the Dow Jones Industrial Average fell 45.32 points to close at 6,563.84.
* The Kuala Lumpur Composite Index rose 1.60 points to 1,163.85.
* Ringgit quoted at 2.5050/60 a dollar at around 0030 GMT after rebounding from a three-month low of 2.5120 on Wednesday following intervention by Bank Negara.
* FACB Bhd said it was forming a joint venture with Fujitsu Systems Business to participate in the development of multimedia services for the Malaysian government.

* The market is expected to remain mixed on Thursday with stale bull liquidation likely to limit gains. "Many are still looking to sell on any rally. The trend is still unclear at the moment," said an institutional dealer at a local brokerage.
